--- create_index.sql
create index foo_bar on foo (
  bar desc,
  baz asc,
)

--- AST
&parser.CreateIndex{
  pos:          0,
  end:          54,
  Unique:       false,
  NullFiltered: false,
  Name:         &parser.Ident{
    pos:  13,
    end:  20,
    Name: "foo_bar",
  },
  TableName: &parser.Ident{
    pos:  24,
    end:  27,
    Name: "foo",
  },
  Keys: []*parser.IndexKey{
    &parser.IndexKey{
      end:  40,
      Name: &parser.Ident{
        pos:  32,
        end:  35,
        Name: "bar",
      },
      Dir: "DESC",
    },
    &parser.IndexKey{
      end:  51,
      Name: &parser.Ident{
        pos:  44,
        end:  47,
        Name: "baz",
      },
      Dir: "ASC",
    },
  },
  Storing:      (*parser.Storing)(nil),
  InterleaveIn: (*parser.InterleaveIn)(nil),
}

--- SQL
CREATE INDEX foo_bar ON foo (bar DESC, baz ASC)
